column4: The license under which this software package is distributed. Does not apply to dependencies if they already have their own license.
A short synopsis of the software package. Include things like purpose, intended audience, and its current state of maturity.
The type of software artifact being described. 'Source code' includes scripts and any non-compiled software
Date software was published. May or may not be the same as the date this Dataverse dataset was created
Link to software in code repository (e.g. Github). Can link to a specific commit or Github release for increased specificity
The programming language(s) corresponding to the artifact.
A general description of the functionality of the artifact. Select all that apply
A description of how users interact with the artifact.
Who contributed to the development of this software package
Name of a particular contributor that contributed to this software package
What was the primary role of this contributor?
Describe any dependencies required (e.g., operating system, frameworks, libraries, etc.) along with their version numbers if available
The general type of dependency associated with this software package
Describe the dependency. Include version numbers and any other relevant information.
Link to where the dependency or additional information on it can be found.
Inputs / Outputs associated with this package
The type of input or output associated with this package
Describe the input or output including any relevant information (size, type, usage, how it arises, caveats, etc.)
Link to the input/output or where additional information on it can be found.
Describe related software e.g., similar software, software that depends on this software, other versions of this software (don't use for dependencies)).
The type of the related software
Additional information that desrcibes the related software
Describe related resources such as website, or associated papers, or other software that haven't already been described (don't use for link to code repository, dependencies, or input/output files).
The type of the related resource
What is the relevance of the related resource to the software being described?
An additional persistent identifier for this software package (if one has been created elsewhere)
Virtuabox, Docker etc. (if the software is distributed using such technology)
links to the subsequent version of this software artifact
links to the prior version of this software artifact
